info.title: IMN marketplace API- DEV
info.description:
# The REST API of IMN system
## Overview
The REST APIs provide programmatic access to read and write IMN data. 
Basically, with this API you will be able to do everything like you were with your browser on https://go.imn.io !

The main features are:
- Register and manage your account
- Create and manage and share your stores with your friends/co-workers.
- Import your product catalog and schedule the auto importation
- Search the channels your want to use
- Configure your channels for your catalogs to export your product information:
    - cost and general settings
    - category and columns mappings
    - your will be able to create and manage your custom column
    - put in place exlusion filters based on simple conditions on your product data
    - override product values
    - get product vision for a channel catalog scope
- Analyze and optimize your performance of your catalogs on all yours channels with different type of reportings by day, channel, category and by product.
- Automatize your optimisation by using rules!
- And of course... Manage your orders harvested from all your marketplaces:
    - Synchronize your orders in an uniformized way
    - Get the available actions and update the order status
- ...and more!

## Authentication credentials
TBD

## Things to keep in mind
### API Rate Limits
- The IMN REST API is limited to 100 calls/minute.

### Media type
The default media type for requests and responses is application/json. Where noted, some operations support other content types. If no additional content type is mentioned for a specific operation, then the media type is application/json.

### Required content type
The required and default encoding for the request and responses is UTF8.

### Required date time format
All our date time are formatted in ISO 8601 format: 2014-06-24T16:25:00Z.

### Base URL
The Base URL of the IMN API Order Management REST API conforms to the following template.

https://api.imn.io

All URLs returned by the IMN API are relative to this base URL, and all requests to the REST API must use this base URL template.

You can test our API on https://api-docs.imn.io/swagger-ui\
You can contact us on [gitter, #IMN/API](https://gitter.im/IMN/API)

x-IMN-api-ops.comment: No change. Just server side generation.

204.description: The merchant orders changes have been saved!

searchContactName.description: Search merchants by the contact name

filterSubscriptionRequestUtcDateFrom.description: filter merchants From beginning subscription request date

filterSubscriptionRequestUtcDateTo.description: filter merchants by subscription request date

searchCompanyName.description: Search merchants by the company name

searchContactName.description: Search merchants by the contact name

filterCreationUtcDateFrom.description: filter merchants by From beginning creation date

filterCreationUtcDateTo.description: filter merchants by to ending creation date

importedOfferCount.description: Imported offer count from the source marketpalce

subscriptionRequestUtcDate.description: date the merchant pushed his registration to the marketplace (through SF)

publishedOfferCount.description: Effective offer count published to the target marketplace

publishableOfferCount.description: Publishable offer count to the target marketplace

targetMarketplaces.description: The key is the marketplace code

merchantListOrderByOn.description: Indicates on which property you want to order by the list of merchant

batchMerchantMarketplaceOrderChanges.description: Contains all changes for one marketplace for one merchant

order_MerchantECommerceSoftwareName.description: The e-commerce software name of the merchant

order_MerchantECommerceSoftwareVersion.description: The e-commece software version of the merchant

dateSearchType.description: Indicates on which date you want to make the filter

pageSize.description: Indicate the order count per page

beginPeriodUtcDate.description:
The begin period you want to make the search. \
The period MUST not be greater than 30 days.
The begin period MUST be lower than the end period.

endPeriodUtcDate.description:
The end period of you search. \
The period MUST not be greater than 30 days. \
The end period MUST be greater than the begin period.
The end period MUST be lower to the current date.

processing.description: If true, there is currently a harvest or an order change in progress. Otherwise false.

orderHeader.description: Describe the basic information related to an order. All properties with the prefix order_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoOrderDetails

order_PurchaseUtcDate.description: The purchase date of this order

order_LastModificationUtcDate.description: The last modification UTC date done by IMN of this order

order_MarketplaceLastModificationUtcDate.description: The last modification UTC date done by the marketplace on this order

order_TotalPrice.description: The total price of this order (corresponding to the amount paid by the customer)

etag.description:
ETag value to identify the order.\
This information is required for the operation GetOrder and ChangeOrder.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

orderItem.description: Describe an order item. All properties with the prefix orderItem_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoOrderItems

imnOrderItemId.description: The IMN identifier of the order Item

orderItem_OrderItemType.description: The order item type of the order item

orderItem_MerchantImportedProductId.description: The product id indicated in the catalog importation in IMN system for this order item. This property will help you to match the order to the inventory system.

orderItem_MerchantImportedProductIdColum.description: The column name for the product id indicated in the catalog importation in IMN system related to this order item. This property will help you to match the order to the inventory system.

orderItem_MerchantImportedProductUrl.description: The product url indicated in the catalog importation in IMN system related to this order item

orderItem_MerchantProductIdColumnName.description: The column name indicate in the mapping for the product id related to the order item

orderItem_IMNStoreId.description: The store id in the IMN system related to the order item. This property will help you to match the order to the inventory system.

orderItem_ItemTax.description: The tax of the order item

orderItem_Title.description: The title of the order item

orderItem_ImageUrl.description: The URL of the image of the order item

orderItem_MerchantProductId.description: The merchant product id of the order item

orderItem_MarketPlaceProductId.description: The marketplace product identifier of the order item

orderItem_ItemPrice.description: The price of the order item

orderItem_Quantity.description: The quantity of the order item

orderItem_TotalPrice.description: The total price of the order item

orderItem_Shipping_Price.description: The shipping price of the order item

allOf.description: Describe in details all informations related to an order. All properties with the prefix order_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov/OrderMetaInfoOrderDetails.

order_MarketPlaceChannel.description: Useful to identify the origin of the order. For example in Amazon.

order_TotalTax.description: The total tax of this order

order_TotalCommission.description: The total commission of this order

order_PaymentMethod.description: The payment method of this order

order_PayingUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the payment of this order

order_Comment.description: The comment associated to this order

order_Shipping_Civility.description: The civility of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_CompanyName.description: The company name of the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_AddressName.description: The name of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_Email.description: The email of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_AddressLine1.description: The shipping address line 1 of this order

order_Shipping_AddressLine2.description: The shipping address line 2 of this order

order_Shipping_AddressLine3.description: The shipping address line 3 of this order

order_Shipping_AddressPostalCode.description: The shipping address postal code of this order

order_Shipping_AddressCity.description: The shipping address city of this order

order_Shipping_AddressStateOrRegion.description: The shipping address state or region of this order

order_Shipping_AddressCountryIsoCodeAlph.description: The shipping address country iso code alpha 2 (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#/decoding_table for more details)

order_Shipping_Phone.description: The phone number of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_MobilePhone.description: The mobile phone number of the person in the shipping address for this order

order_Shipping_Price.description: The shipping price of this order

order_Shipping_Method.description: The shipping method of this order

order_Shipping_ShippingTax.description: The shipping tax for this order

order_Shipping_EarliestShipUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the earliest ship for this order

order_Shipping_LatestShipUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the latest ship for this order

order_Buyer_Identifier.description: The buyer identifier for this order

order_Buyer_Civility.description: The buyer civility for this order

order_Buyer_CompanyName.description: The buyer company name for this order

order_Buyer_Email.description: The email of the buyer for this order

order_Buyer_AddressLine1.description: The Buyer address line 1 of this order

order_Buyer_AddressLine2.description: The Buyer address line 2 of this order

order_Buyer_AddressLine3.description: The Buyer address line 3 of this order

order_Buyer_AddressPostalCode.description: The Buyer address postal code of this order

order_Buyer_AddressCity.description: The Buyer address city of this order

order_Buyer_AddressStateOrRegion.description: The Buyer address state or region of this order

order_Buyer_AddressCountryIsoCodeAlpha2.description: The Buyer address country iso code alpha 2 (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#/decoding_table for more details)

order_Buyer_Phone.description: The phone number of the buyer for this order

order_Buyer_MobilePhone.description: The mobile phone number of the buyer for this order

rel.description: Indicate the relation name related to the link

orderTransitionLinks.description: Contains the authorized change actions for an order

orderIndexLinks.description: Gives you all entry point operations you can do on this API

orderIndexLovLinks.description: Gives you all the LOV to get the translations realated to operation name, codes, property names and statuses.

orderListLinks.description: The list of actions you can do from the order list response

orderListLight.description:
The order list with minimum information we have from the orders.\
The paginationResult properties can be null if the list is empty.

orderListFull.description:
The order list with all information we have from the orders and its items.\
The paginationResult properties can be null if the list is empty.

imnOrderStatus.description: IMN order status. Unified for all marketplaces.

orderHistory.description: Describe the history related to an order

changeOrderReportings.description: The list of change order operation

sourceType.description: Indicates the origin of the operation

changeOrderReporting.description: The reporting related to a change order operation

creationUtcDate.description: The creation UTC date of the execution

processingStatus.description: The processing status of the execution

lastUpdateUtcDate.description: The last update UTC date of the execution

errorMessage.description: The error message during the execution

ipAddress.description: The IP address who request this operation

changeOrderListRequest.description: Contains all change order operations you want to make

changeOrderListRequestItem.description: Contains the order identifier and the change order request

changeOrderRequest.description: All properties with the prefix order_ are translated in the list of values /user/lov#OrderMetaInfoPosted

batchOrderOperationResponse.description: The response given by the batch operation

orderOperationResponse.description: The response given by the batch operation for an order

success.description: Indicates if the operation succeed or not

status.description: Indicates the http status corresponding to the individual operation

subscriptionName.description: The subscription name you want to use

orderEventType.description: The event type you can subscribe to

merchantMarketplaceSubscriptionRefusalRe.description: The marketplace reason for the subscription's refusal

charge.description: The charge for this delivery mode considering the rule

additionalCharge.description: The additional charge for this delivery mode

source.description: If true, this marketplace is the source of offers

merchantCode.description: The merchant code identifier in IMN

marketplaceCode.description:
The marketplace code identifier in IMN. 
For now we have:
- C1 for Cdiscount
- E1 for ePrice
- R1 for Real.DE
- B1 for BOL

marketplaceMerchantCode.description: The merchant code for a marketplace

categoryPath.description: Indicates on which catalog category path you want to make the filter
Indicates on which channel category path you want to make the filter

values.description:
Must be null if the operator is "IsNull" or "IsNotNull". 
Can contains multiple value in case of "InList" operator. Otherwise a single value is expected.

additionalProductFilters.description:
Describe a filter on a product's column.
The key is the column identifier of your catalog or a custom column.

productFilterOperatorName.description: Indicate the operator you want to make on the columnId

productBasicInfo.description: The basic information related to a product

productExists.description: Indicates if the product still exists in your catalog

listOfValueItem.description: This object is used by LOV apis

href.description: Indicate the relative uri for this link

httpMethod.description: Indicate the http method to use on this link

label.description: The label corresponding to the link. This label is automatically translated based on the Accept-Language http header.

urlTemplated.description: indicates whether the href is templated or not

allRequiredParamsProvided.description: indicates whether all required params have been provided

allOptionalParamsProvided.description: indicates whether all optionals params have been provided

rel.description: Indicate the relation name related to the link

parameterIn.description:
* path: if the parameter must be pass in the path uri
* header: if the parameter must be passed in http header
* query: if the parameter must be passed in querystring
* body: if the parameter must be passed in the body
* file: if the parameter must be passed in a multipart/form-data (https://swagger.io/docs/specification/2-0/file-upload/)

parameterType.description: The value type of the parameter

label.description: The label corresponding to the link parameter. This label is automatically translated based on the Accept-Language http header.

value.description: The value of the parameter. It can be an integer a string or an object.

lovRequired.description: If true, you MUST indicate a value from the list of values otherwise it's a freetext

properties.description: If the parameter is an object with flexible properties (additionProperties/dictionary), we will describe the properties of the object.

validationPattern.description: The regular expression to validate the value

label.description: The label corresponding to the link parameter property. This label is automatically translated based on the Accept-Language http header.

value.description: The value of the parameter. It can be an integer a string or an object.

lovRequired.description: If true, you MUST use indicate a value from the list of values otherwise it's a freetext

lovLink.description: This parameter expect the values indicated in this list of values.

lovRequired.description: If true, you MUST use indicate a value from the list of values otherwise it's a freetext

LOVLink2.description: Describe the way you have to follow to get access to the LOV

rel.description: Indicate the relation name related to the link

href.description: Indicate the relative uri pattern to the list of value

listName.description: The name of the list of value

LOVLink3.description: Describe the way you have to follow to get access to the LOV

href.description: Indicate the uri to the list of value

docUrl.description: The documentation related to this operation.

code.description: the error code. The error code can be a pattern containing the argument's name

message.example: There is already an importation in progress: b24d0dd8-a561-478a-9b26-34f573f03527

cultureName.description: If the error is translated, the culture name will be indicated

marketplaceApiCredential.description: The API credentials of the merchant on his marketplace.

externalDocs.description: Find the documentation for IMN's API here

tags: Marketplace - Merchants API - Marketplace Merchant Code

userNameInQueryParameter.name: userName
userNameInQueryParameter.description: Sometimes the user in the e-commerce application is not the same as user associated with the current subscription key. We recommend providing your application's user login.

testModeInQueryParameter.name: testMode
testModeInQueryParameter.description: If true, the operation will be not be sent to marketplace. But the validation will be taken in account.

pageNumberQueryStringParameter.name: pageNumber
pageNumberQueryStringParameter.description: The page number you want to get

pageSizeQueryStringParameter.name: pageSize
pageSizeQueryStringParameter.description: The entry count you want to get

ifNoneMatchParameter.name: If-None-Match
ifNoneMatchParameter.description:
ETag value to identify the last known version of requested resource.\
To avoid useless exchange, we recommend you to indicate the ETag you previously got from this operation.\
If the ETag value does not match the response will be 200 to give you a new content, otherwise the response will be: 304 Not Modified, without any content.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

ifMatchParameter.name: If-Match
ifMatchParameter.description:
ETag value to identify the last known version of requested resource.\
To ensure that you are making a change on the lastest version of the resource.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

acceptLanguageParameter.name: Accept-Language
acceptLanguageParameter.description: Indicates that the client accepts the following languages.

acceptEncodingRequiredParameter.name: Accept-Encoding
acceptEncodingRequiredParameter.description: Allows the client to indicate wether it accepts a compressed encoding to reduce traffic size.

acceptEncodingOptionalParameter.name: Accept-Encoding
acceptEncodingOptionalParameter.description: Allows the client to indicate wether it accepts a compressed encoding to reduce traffic size.

304_NotModified.description: The ETag sent in the http header If-None-Match did not change. So you are up to date !

Last-Modified.description:
Last modification UTC date of the resource\
For more details go to this link: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.2

ETag.description:
ETag value to identify the current version of the resource\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

412_PreConditionFailed.description: The ETag sent in the http header If-Match did not match with the current version. Please refresh the information related to this resource.

ETag.description:
The ETag value to identify the resource.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

merchantNotFound.description: The merchant code is not found.

marketplaceNotFound.description: The marketplace code is not found.

merchantOrMarketplaceNotFound.description: The merchant code or marketplace code is not found.

merchantCodeAlreadyUsed.description: The merchant code is not available

invalidMerchantCode.description: The merchant code is different from the state

notOfferSourceMarketplace.description: The marketplace is not the offer source

subscriptionNotAcceptedByMarketplace.description: The subscription is not accepted by marketplace
